Title: Relates to youth programs sponsored by fire departments
Summary: Relates to youth programs sponsored by fire departments; provides that participants may respond to an emergency or hazardous activity, but shall remain in a designated or marked off area that has been set up by the chief or officer in charge; provides such participant cannot respond to an emergency on a vehicle using lights and/or sirens; provides such participants may not enter a burning structure.
LawCode: Amd ยง204-b, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to participants in youth programs sponsored by fire departments
